title: Termination of candidate committee's or noncandidate committee's registration
context: [ยง11-326] Termination of candidate committee&rsquo;s or noncandidate committee&rsquo;s registration. A candidate committee or noncandidate committee may terminate its registration if: (1) The candidate committee or noncandidate committee: (A) Files a request for registration termination form; (B) Files a report disclosing contributions and expenditures not previously reported by the committee, and the committee has no surplus or deficit; and &copy; Mails or delivers to the commission a copy of the committee&rsquo;s closing bank statement; and (2) The request is approved by the commission. [L 2010, c 211, pt of ยง2]
